languages.text: "Говорят, в теневых костры недавно пылали... целыми семьями жгли..."
"They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."
languages.original_text: "Говорят, в теневых костры недавно пылали... целыми семьями жгли..."

traits.locale_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."
"They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."
"They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

languages.text: 「最近、シャドウクォーターでたき火が見られたと言われています…一家全員が焼かれたとか…」
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: 「最近、シャドウクォーターでたき火が見られたと言われています…一家全員が焼かれたとか…」
「最近、シャドウクォーターでたき火が見られたと言われています…一家全員が焼かれたとか…」

languages.text: « Il paraît qu'ils ont allumé des bûchers dans le Quartier des Ombres... Des familles entières ont été brûlées vives... »
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: « Il paraît qu'ils ont allumé des bûchers dans le Quartier des Ombres... Des familles entières ont été brûlées vives... »

languages.text: “他们说阴影区最近也开始烧人了……好几家人都被统统烧死了……”
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: “他们说阴影区最近也开始烧人了……好几家人都被统统烧死了……”

languages.text: «Dicen que se han visto hogueras en los barrios bajos... Han quemado vivas a familias enteras...».
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: «Dicen que se han visto hogueras en los barrios bajos... Han quemado vivas a familias enteras...».

languages.text: "Angeblich gab es in den Schattenquartieren Scheiterhaufen ... Ganze Familien wurden verbrannt ..."
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: "Angeblich gab es in den Schattenquartieren Scheiterhaufen ... Ganze Familien wurden verbrannt ..."

languages.text: "Gölge Mahalli'nde ateşler yakılıyormuş... Aileleri topluca yakmışlar..."
languages.original_text: "They say that bonfires were recently seen in the Shadow Quarters... Entire families were burned..."

traits.locale_text: "Gölge Mahali’nde ateşler yakılıyormuş... Aileleri topluca yakmışlar..."
